description.english: Brilliant fire from the Oriental. Get hero [Landis Frame]
description.schinese: 火之绚烂，来自东方。获得英雄【兰迪斯·弗雷姆】
description.tchinese: 火之絢爛，來自東方。獲得英雄【蘭迪斯·弗雷姆】

description.english: May the light always shine upon you. Get hero [Iruril Erik]
description.schinese: 愿你耳畔有阳光，笑颜常在。获得英雄【伊露莉·埃里克】
description.tchinese: 願你耳畔有陽光，笑顏常在。獲得英雄【伊露莉·埃裏克】

description.english: Stay a while and listen. I still have lots of tales to tell. Get hero [Huey]
description.schinese: 静静聆听吧，我还有很多故事要讲。获得英雄【修伊】
description.tchinese: 靜靜聆聽吧，我還有很多故事要講。獲得英雄【修伊】

displayName.english: The Lord of Present and Past

description.english: Look the shadow on the wall, a funny bunny. Get hero [Reisterin Marshell]
description.schinese: 墙上的影子，可笑的兔子。获得英雄【瑞斯特林·玛西尔】
description.tchinese: 牆上的影子，可笑的兔子。獲得英雄【瑞斯特林·瑪西爾】

description.english: Justice will be delivered. Kill hero [Scarlet Tooth Tiger].
description.schinese: 善恶终有报，苍天饶过谁？斩首英雄【猩牙虎】。
description.tchinese: 善惡終有報，蒼天饒過誰？斬首英雄【猩牙虎】。

description.english: These guys are actually still alive? Collect all Red Hand members.
description.schinese: 这群家伙居然还活着？集齐红手军团全体成员。
description.tchinese: 這群傢伙居然還活著？集齊紅手軍團全體成員。

description.english: Flame Black and seven giants (A wizard doesn't deserve a name?).
description.schinese: 黑炎王子和七个小巨人（巫师不配拥有姓名？）。
description.tchinese: 黑炎王子和七個小巨人（巫師不配擁有姓名？）。

description.english: You are formidable. Defeat enemy legion 10 times.
description.schinese: 你让敌人闻风丧胆。战胜敌方军团10次。
description.tchinese: 你讓敵人聞風喪膽。戰勝敵方軍團10次。

description.english: You are invincible! Defeat enemy legion 100 times.
description.schinese: 你真的是百战百胜啊！战胜敌方军团100次。
description.tchinese: 你真的是百戰百勝啊！戰勝敵方軍團100次。

description.english: Blood stained your hands. Kill 88 heroes.
description.schinese: 双手沾满了鲜血。斩首88个英雄。
description.tchinese: 雙手沾滿了鮮血。斬首88個英雄。

description.english: You've already had the power to conquer the world. Take 15 cities.
description.schinese: 你已经具备了争雄天下的实力。占领15个城市。
description.tchinese: 你已經具備了爭雄天下的實力。佔領15個城市。

description.english: The king who lost his kingdom. Lose the kingdom.
description.schinese: 惨遭灭国的倒霉君主。被灭国。
description.tchinese: 慘遭滅國的倒楣君主。被滅國。

description.english: The Sun God Ashur bless you. Complete hero [Lenna Abhoth]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 太阳神阿舒尔祝福着你。完成英雄【蕾娜·阿布霍斯】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 太陽神阿舒爾祝福著你。完成英雄【蕾娜·阿布霍斯】的主線任務。

description.english: The Rhuterino is going to rise. Complete hero [Lamia Rhuterino] and [Beramode Rhuterino]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 路坦尼欧家族将从此崛起。完成英雄【拉米亚·路坦尼欧】和【贝拉莫德·路坦尼欧】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 路坦尼歐家族將從此崛起。完成英雄【拉米亞·路坦尼歐】和【貝拉莫德·路坦尼歐】的主線任務。

description.english: No one will doubt about your identity now, Inanna. Complete hero [Meloetta Cavan]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 没有人质疑你伊南娜的身份了。完成英雄【梅洛艾塔·卡文】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 沒有人質疑你伊南娜的身份了。完成英雄【梅洛艾塔·卡文】的主線任務。

description.english: The incarnation of justice from sky has come to the mortal world. Complete hero [Oravec Star]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 天空的正义，降临凡间。完成英雄【奥兰维希·星辰】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 天空的正義，降臨凡間。完成英雄【奧蘭維希·星辰】的主線任務。

description.english: Those who are still wet behind the ears will be no match for you anymore. Complete hero [Aravictor Mays]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 那些乳臭未干的小孩子，将不再是你的对手。完成英雄【亚拉维特·梅斯】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 那些乳臭未乾的小孩子，將不再是你的對手。完成英雄【亞拉維特·梅斯】的主線任務。

description.english: You are a peerless warrior. Complete hero [Theodore Royce]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 陌上人如玉，公子世无双。完成英雄【提欧多·罗伊斯】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 陌上人如玉，公子世無雙。完成英雄【提歐多·羅伊斯】的主線任務。

description.english: You've lived a thousand years, but you are still as powerful as you were young. Complete hero [Delantis Greenleaf]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 即使千年已过，您依然天下无敌。完成英雄【黛兰迪斯·绿叶】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 即使千年已過，您依然天下無敵。完成英雄【黛蘭迪斯·綠葉】的主線任務。

description.english: The dream world is both an illusion and a reality. Complete hero [Ereda Longnight]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 梦境如幻，亦似真。完成英雄【厄瑞达·长夜】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 夢境如幻，亦似真。完成英雄【厄瑞達·長夜】的主線任務。

description.english: That great existence has answered you. Complete hero [Seraph]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 那位伟大的存在回应了你。完成英雄【萨库法】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 那位偉大的存在回應了你。完成英雄【薩庫法】的主線任務。

description.english: From now on, we are all brothers and sisters. Complete hero [Salotana Specterlich]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 从此以后，大家都是兄弟姊妹。完成英雄【怨灵巫妖·萨罗塔娜】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 從此以後，大家都是兄弟姊妹。完成英雄【怨靈巫妖·薩羅塔娜】的主線任務。

description.english: You only need one shot. Complete hero [Frey]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 你只需要一箭。完成英雄【遥远】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 你只需要一箭。完成英雄【遙遠】的主線任務。

description.english: The darkness has started to awaken. Complete hero [Byrdwenner Thorn]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 黑暗开始涌动。完成英雄【珀德温纳·索恩】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 黑暗開始湧動。完成英雄【珀德溫納·索恩】的主線任務。

description.english: Your equipment is so gorgeous. Complete hero [Gerson Goldarmor]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 你这身装备，真是羡煞旁人。完成英雄【格尔森·金盔】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 你這身裝備，真是羨煞旁人。完成英雄【格爾森·金盔】的主線任務。

description.english: You are well prepared. Complete hero [Lajos Nagl] and [Rea Nagl]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 你已经做好了准备。完成英雄【拉约什·纳格尔】和【芮雅·纳格尔】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 你已經做好了準備。完成英雄【拉約什·納格爾】和【芮雅·納格爾】的主線任務。

description.english: It's just a beginning and there are more surprises waiting. Complete hero [Shahram Wolfbiter]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 这还只是开始，精彩的还在后头。完成英雄【赫拉姆·噬狼者】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 這還只是開始，精彩的還在後頭。完成英雄【赫拉姆·噬狼者】的主線任務。

description.english: That woman is actually interesting. Complete hero [Micipsa]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 那个女人果然很有趣。完成英雄【米奇普萨】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 那個女人果然很有趣。完成英雄【米奇普薩】的主線任務。

displayName.english: The True Warrior of My Clan

description.english: The other Crafts are all weaklings. Complete hero [Schilder Craft]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 克莱夫特家族其他人都是弟弟妹妹。完成英雄【希尔德·克莱夫特】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 克萊夫特家族其他人都是弟弟妹妹。完成英雄【希爾德·克萊夫特】的主線任務。

description.english: You've got great resolution. Complete hero [Skehan Whiteblade]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 你已经有足够的觉悟了。完成英雄【斯凯恩·白刃】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 你已經有足夠的覺悟了。完成英雄【斯凱恩·白刃】的主線任務。

description.english: They are probably the three pals always lurking in bushes. Complete hero [Cronus Augustus], [Uranus Augustus] and [Marcus Felix]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 这大概就是草丛三基友。完成英雄【克洛诺斯·奥古斯】、【尤拉诺斯·奥古斯】和【马尔库斯·费列克斯】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 這大概就是草叢三基友。完成英雄【克洛諾斯·奧古斯】、【尤拉諾斯·奧古斯】和【馬爾庫斯·費列克斯】的主線任務。

description.english: You're going to start your own journal now. Complete hero [Aioros Drake]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 你要开始记录属于你自己的日记了。完成英雄【艾洛斯·罗伊斯】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 你要開始記錄屬於你自己的日記了。完成英雄【艾洛斯·羅伊斯】的主線任務。

description.english: Theodore has finally spat it out. Complete hero [Caranthir Starlight]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 提欧多最后还是说出口了。完成英雄【卡兰希尔·星光】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 提歐多最後還是說出口了。完成英雄【卡蘭希爾·星光】的主線任務。

description.english: The Holy Lake doesn't exist anymore. It needs a new name. Complete hero [Danos Bloodsword]'s main quest.
description.schinese: 圣湖不复存在，得给它起个新名字。完成英雄【达诺斯·血剑】的主线任务。
description.tchinese: 聖湖不復存在，得給它起個新名字。完成英雄【達諾斯·血劍】的主線任務。

description.english: You conquered Land of Laud. Complete the world conquest once.
description.schinese: 你征服了赞美之地。完成一次世界统一。
description.tchinese: 你征服了讚美之地。完成一次世界統一。

description.english: My heart belongs to the vast grassland. Use country [Balorica] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 我的心中只有这广袤无垠的草原。使用势力【巴洛利卡】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 我的心中只有這廣袤無垠的草原。使用勢力【巴洛利卡】完成統一。

description.english: No one will go back to Adad anymore. Use country [Darkdust Tribe] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 已经不会有人再前往阿达德的身边了。使用势力【黑沙部落】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 已經不會有人再前往阿達德的身邊了。使用勢力【黑沙部落】完成統一。

description.english: Our bodies and souls are all bound together. Use country [Shadow Undead] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 我们的身心将紧密的联系在一起。使用势力【幽影死灵】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 我們的身心將緊密的聯繫在一起。使用勢力【幽影死靈】完成統一。

description.english: What's my meat is your poison. Use country [Constante] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 是我的美食，却是你的毒药。使用势力【康斯坦特】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 是我的美食，卻是你的毒藥。使用勢力【康斯坦特】完成統一。

description.english: The icy blood will run forever. Use country [Noseiffen] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 极冰的血脉将永远流淌下去。使用势力【挪塞芬斯】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 極冰的血脈將永遠流淌下去。使用勢力【挪塞芬斯】完成統一。

description.english: Everyone is following Inanna the prophet's steps. Use country [Brunia] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 所有人都将追随先知伊南娜的足迹。使用势力【布露尼亚】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 所有人都將追隨先知伊南娜的足跡。使用勢力【布露尼亞】完成統一。

description.english: Sky and justice is watching over the world. Use country [Augeas] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 天空与正义，俯瞰天下。使用势力【奥吉亚斯】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 天空與正義，俯瞰天下。使用勢力【奧吉亞斯】完成統一。

description.english: From now on, we'll be the only magic authority. Use country [Gramer] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 从今往后，我们将是唯一的魔法权威。使用势力【格拉默】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 從今往後，我們將是唯一的魔法權威。使用勢力【格拉默】完成統一。

description.english: We'll grip the future of the new country. Use country [Larburg] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 我们将手握未来与崭新的国家。使用势力【拉尔博格】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 我們將手握未來與嶄新的國家。使用勢力【拉爾博格】完成統一。

description.english: Everyone is the main character of his own story. Use country [Adas] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 每个人都是自己故事里的主角。使用势力【阿达斯】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 每個人都是自己故事裏的主角。使用勢力【阿達斯】完成統一。

description.english: There's nothing for you to raid anymore. Use country [Manu] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 已经没有东西能让你去争抢了。使用势力【马努】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 已經沒有東西能讓你去爭搶了。使用勢力【馬努】完成統一。

description.english: Let's sow disorder and disasters to the Land of Laud. Use country [Ossell] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 将混乱与灾祸、播种在整个赞美之地。使用势力【厄斯塞勒】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 將混亂與災禍、播種在整個讚美之地。使用勢力【厄斯塞勒】完成統一。

description.english: Our next goal will be the Sea of Devils! Use country [Hagmonia] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 下一步的征途将是魔鬼之海！使用势力【海格摩尼亚】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 下一步的征途將是魔鬼之海！使用勢力【海格摩尼亞】完成統一。

description.english: I'll turn you to sand in revenge for you ignoring me yesterday. Use country [Nubidia] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 昨日你对我爱搭不理，今天我叫你化为黄沙。使用势力【努比迪亚】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 昨日你對我愛搭不理，今天我叫你化為黃沙。使用勢力【努比迪亞】完成統一。

description.english: Islot Empire is restored! Use country [Recovery Army] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 伊斯洛特帝国成功光复！使用势力【帝国光复军】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 伊斯洛特帝國成功光復！使用勢力【帝國光復軍】完成統一。

description.english: I've defeated my sister. Use country [Royal Guard] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 我打赢了我姐。使用势力【帝国禁卫军】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 我打贏了我姐。使用勢力【帝國禁衛軍】完成統一。

description.english: The order is rebuilt. Use country [Lanlerner] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 已将秩序重建。使用势力【伊恩莱纳】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 已將秩序重建。使用勢力【伊恩萊納】完成統一。

description.english: We've won what belonged to us. Use country [Dunatticus] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: 我们，夺回了曾经属于自己的一切。使用势力【杜纳提克斯】完成统一。
description.tchinese: 我們，奪回了曾經屬於自己的一切。使用勢力【杜納提克斯】完成統一。

description.english: "Mwahahah…hiccup!..."Use country [Blade Mountain] to complete the conquest.
description.schinese: “哈哈哈哈…嗝！……”使用势力【钢锋山】完成统一。
description.tchinese: “哈哈哈哈…嗝！……”使用勢力【鋼鋒山】完成統一。

description.english: Get a victory when enemy military power is 1.5 times yours.
description.schinese: 敌方军力高于己方1.5倍依然取胜。
description.tchinese: 敵方軍力高於己方1.5倍依然取勝。

description.english: Get a victory when enemy military power is 2 times yours.
description.schinese: 敌方军力高于己方2倍依然取胜。
description.tchinese: 敵方軍力高於己方2倍依然取勝。

description.english: Get a victory when enemy military power is 3 times yours.
description.schinese: 敌方军力高于己方3倍依然取胜。
description.tchinese: 敵方軍力高於己方3倍依然取勝。

description.english: What? The shop owner is selling herself? Shop consumption reaches 233333.
description.schinese: 买东西，送老板娘？商店消费满233333。
description.tchinese: 買東西，送老闆娘？商店消費滿233333。

description.english: The story of two people will be continued from now on. Complete the hero "Alicebell and rocky" mission.
description.schinese: 两个人的故事，从现在开始续写。完成英雄「爱丽丝贝尔&洛奇」任务
description.tchinese: 兩個人的故事，從現在開始續寫。完成英雄「愛麗絲貝爾&洛奇」任務。

description.english: Hand in hand and love forever. Complete the hero "Meloetta and Levarieg" mission.
description.schinese: 携手共进，一同成长。完成英雄「梅洛艾塔&莱瓦尔」任务。
description.tchinese: 攜手共進，一同成長。完成英雄「梅洛艾塔&萊瓦爾」任務。

description.english: The story of my reincarnation across to  Eagarlnia. Complete the hero "Kiehl and Ruadan" mission
description.schinese: 关于我转生穿越到伊格利亚这档事…完成英雄「契&卢尔丹」任务…
description.tchinese: 關於我轉生穿越到伊格利亞這檔事……完成英雄「契&盧爾丹」任務。

description.english: Fortunately, there is still hope to light up everything.  Complete the hero "Huey" mission
description.schinese: 所幸还留有希望，能点亮一切。完成英雄「修伊」任务。
description.tchinese: 所幸還留有希望，能點亮一切。完成英雄「修伊」任務。

description.english: One for all. Complete the hero "Landis" mission.
description.schinese: 我为人人，完成英雄「兰迪斯」任务。
description.tchinese: 我為人人。完成英雄「蘭迪斯」任務。

description.english: There are stories of black haired elf all over the world. Complete the hero "Iruril " mission.
description.schinese: 世界各地都留有黑发女精灵的足迹。完成英雄「伊露莉」任务
description.tchinese: 世界各地都留有黑髮女精靈的足跡。完成英雄「伊露莉」任務。

description.english: From now on, you have to unlock the secret hidden in the scabbard. Get the hero "Somori Koma".
description.schinese: 现在开始，你要解开隐藏在刀鞘中的秘密，获得英雄「子摩楚守」
description.tchinese: 現在開始，你要解開隱藏在刀鞘中的秘密。獲得英雄「子摩楚守」。

description.english: The sun pierces the dark clouds and the world is bright. Get the hero "Ling Xue".
description.schinese: 天光破云，复立乾坤，获得英雄「菱雪」
description.tchinese: 天光破雲，複立乾坤。獲得英雄「菱雪」。

description.english: Frost carved a lonely tough, very drunk playing songs, which is true?
description.schinese: 霜花雕镂一孤韧，醉极弹歌孰为真？
description.tchinese: 霜花雕鏤一孤韌，醉極彈歌孰為真？

description.english: If Qing is compared to his sister, what is this strange blade?
description.schinese: 如果把清比作妹妹，这把怪刀又是什么呢？
description.tchinese: 如果把清比作妹妹，這把怪刀又是什麼呢？

description.english: All my life I've been searching for power and light
description.schinese: 我穷极一生……只为追寻强大力量与一束光……
description.tchinese: 我窮極一生……只為追尋強大力量與一束光……

description.english: Relived the past glory
description.schinese: 旧日辉煌，今朝重现。
description.tchinese: 舊日輝煌，今朝重現。

description.english: No one can ignore us anymore!
description.schinese: 没有人可以再忽视我们的存在！
description.tchinese: 沒有人可以再忽視我們的存在！

description.english: You couldn't find a piece of land that don't belong to us.
description.schinese: 普天之下莫非王土……
description.tchinese: 普天之下莫非王土……

description.english: The world is within control.
description.schinese: 天下已是囊中之物。
description.tchinese: 天下已是囊中之物。

description.english: Perhaps we are more powerful than the legendary "Shadow"?
description.schinese: 也许我们比这个世界传说中的“幽影”更加强大？
description.tchinese: 也許我們比這個世界傳說中的“幽影”更加強大？

description.english: Hero is born
description.schinese: 应运而生。
description.tchinese: 應運而生。

description.english: I'll remember, it's our secret.
description.schinese: 我会记住它，这是我们的秘密。
description.tchinese: 我會記住它，這是我們的秘密。

description.english: The wind was blowing, and the dark clouds were surging.
description.schinese: 大风刮起，乌云涌动。
description.tchinese: 大風刮起，烏雲湧動。

description.english: Never-ending work
description.schinese: 永远做不完的工作.
description.tchinese: 永遠做不完的工作

description.english: Incomparable Wisdom
description.schinese: 智计无双
description.tchinese: 智計無雙

description.english: One of the greatest fighters on the land.
description.schinese: 巾帼不让须眉
description.tchinese: 巾幗不讓鬚眉

description.english: Wisdom of the ancients
description.schinese: 古老者的智慧
description.tchinese: 古老者的智慧

description.english: The moonlights illuminates my way.
description.schinese: 月光照亮我前进的道路
description.tchinese: 月光照亮我前進的道路

description.english: I will fulfill our long-cherished goal!
description.schinese: 我将完成我们一直以来的夙愿！
description.tchinese: 我將完成我們一直以來的夙願！

description.english: Are they what you fear? They are my friends.
description.schinese: 它们是你们所畏惧的吗，而它们是我的朋友。
description.tchinese: 它們是你們所畏懼的嗎，而它們是我的朋友。
